thread.title: 4G smartphones under Rs 6,000 available in India
thread.title_full: 4G smartphones under Rs 6,000 available in India

title: 4G smartphones under Rs 6,000 available in India
text:
Oct 20, 2015, 02.29 PM | Source: IBNLive.com 4G smartphones under Rs 6,000 available in India A handy list of smartphones with 4G connectivity that are available under Rs 6,000 in India.   4G smartphones under Rs 6,000 available in India A handy list of smartphones with 4G connectivity that are available under Rs 6,000 in India.   
A handy list of smartphones with 4G connectivity that are available under Rs 6,000 in India. Micromax Yu Yunique The affordable 4G smartphone features a 4.7-inch HD IPS display, Android Lollipop 5.1 operating system, 1.2 GHz quad-core processor, 1GB RAM, 8GB memory, 8MP rear and 2MP front camera and 2,000 mAh battery. Price: Rs 4,999. Phicomm Energy 653 The 4G LTE Android smartphone comes with a 5-inch HD display and is powered by a 1.1 Ghz Qualcomm Snapdragon 210 processor combined with 1 GB RAM. It features an 8 megapixel rear camera with LED flash and a 2 megapixel front snapper. Price: Rs 4,999 Lenovo A2010 Claimed to be India's most economical 4G LTE dual-SIM smartphone, Lenovo A2010 is powered by a MediaTek MT6735m 64-bit quad-core 1.0GHz processor, features a 4.5-inch display, and runs the latest Android 5.1 Lollipop OS. The phone will be available in black and white colours. It is priced at Rs 4,990. 
Coolpad Dazen 1 The phone is powered by a 1.2GHz quad-core Qualcomm Snapdragon processor coupled with 2GB of RAM and 8GB of builtâ€“in storage. It sports an 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front-facing camera. The phone is packed with 2500 mAh battery. It costs Rs 5,999. 
Xiaomi Redmi 2 Successor to the successful Redmi 1S, the Redmi 2 features a 4.7-inch IPS HD display. It features an 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front snapper.It includes 8GB of internal storage and is powered by a 2200mAh battery. Price: Rs 5,999. 
ZTE Blade Q Lux 4G The Android KitKat based smartphone sports a 4.5-inch IPS display and runs on 1.3GHz MediaTek MT6732M chipset combined with 1GB RAM. It includes 8GB internal storage and is powered by a 2200mAh battery. It has 8MP rear camera and a 5MP front camera. It has been priced at Rs 4,999. 
InFocus M2 4G Successor to the M2, the InFocus M2 4G comes with a 4.2-inch display and features 8 megapixel cameras both in the rear and front. It is powered by a 2010mAh battery and includes 8GB of internal storage. It is priced at Rs 5,499. 
Blue Win JR LTE The only Windows handset to make it to our list. The Blu Win JR LTE features a 4.5-inch FWVGA IPS display and includes 512MB of RAM. It features 5MP auto focus rear camera combined with a VGA front facing camera. It draws its juice from a 2000mAh battery. Price: Rs 5,999.
